verbose_text: We validated these findings by immunofluorescence analysis in a subset (n = 3) of high-dose AAV8-Cre-injected animals, confirming the presence of tdTomato + muscle satellite cells (marked by Pax7 expression and by their localization beneath the basal lamina) in 29 of 30 of sections analyzed from three AAV-Cre-injected mice (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
